verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Me.

"But if <S%H518><s%> you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> [them] go, <S%H7971><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will smite <S%H5062><s%> your whole <S%H3605><s%> territory <S%H1366><s%> with frogs. <S%H6854><s%>

"And the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will swarm <S%H8317><s%> with frogs, <S%H6854><s%> which will come <S%H5927><s%> up and go <S%H935><s%> into your house <S%H1004><s%> and into your bedroom <S%H2315><s%> <S%H4904><s%> and on your bed, <S%H4296><s%> and into the houses <S%H1004><s%> of your servants <S%H5650><s%> and on your people, <S%H5971><s%> and into your ovens <S%H8574><s%> and into your kneading <S%H4863><s%> bowls. <S%H4863><s%>
"So the frogs <S%H6854><s%> will come <S%H5927><s%> up on you and your people <S%H5971><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your servants. <S%H5650><s%>"' "

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Say <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> 'Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> with your staff <S%H4294><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the rivers, <S%H5104><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the streams <S%H2975><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> the pools, <S%H98><s%> and make frogs <S%H6854><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> up on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>'"

So Aaron <S%H175><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the frogs <S%H6854><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up and covered <S%H3680><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the same <S%H3651><s%> with their secret <S%H3909><s%> arts, <S%H3909><s%> making frogs <S%H6854><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> up on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Entreat <S%H6279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that He remove <S%H5493><s%> the frogs <S%H6854><s%> from me and from my people; <S%H5971><s%> and I will let <S%H7971><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "The honor <S%H6286><s%> is yours to tell me: when <S%H4970><s%> shall I entreat <S%H6279><s%> for you and your servants <S%H5650><s%> and your people, <S%H5971><s%> that the frogs <S%H6854><s%> be destroyed <S%H3772><s%> from you and your houses, <S%H1004><s%> [that] they may be left <S%H7604><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> in the Nile <S%H2975><s%>?"

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "Tomorrow. <S%H4279><s%>" So he said, <S%H559><s%> "[May it be] according to your word, <S%H1697><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> like the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

"And the frogs <S%H6854><s%> will depart <S%H5493><s%> from you and your houses <S%H1004><s%> and your servants <S%H5650><s%> and your people; <S%H5971><s%> they will be left <S%H7604><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> in the Nile. <S%H2975><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> the frogs <S%H6854><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He had inflicted <S%H7760><s%> upon Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and the frogs <S%H6854><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> out of the houses, <S%H1004><s%> the courts, <S%H2691><s%> and the fields. <S%H7704><s%>
So they piled <S%H6651><s%> them in heaps, <S%H9148><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> became <S%H887><s%> foul. <S%H887><s%>

But when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was relief, <S%H7309><s%> he hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> and did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Say <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> 'Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your staff <S%H4294><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that it may become <S%H1961><s%> gnats <S%H3654><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>'"

And they did <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3651><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> with his staff, <S%H4294><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and there were gnats <S%H3654><s%> on man <S%H120><s%> and beast. <S%H929><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> gnats <S%H3654><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> tried <S%H6213><s%> with their secret <S%H3909><s%> arts <S%H3909><s%> to bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> gnats, <S%H3654><s%> but they could <S%H3201><s%> not; so there were gnats <S%H3654><s%> on man <S%H120><s%> and beast. <S%H929><s%>

Then the magicians <S%H2748><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "This <S%H1931><s%> is the finger <S%H676><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>" But Pharaoh's heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Rise <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> and present <S%H3320><s%> yourself <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> as he comes <S%H3318><s%> out to the water, <S%H4325><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Me.

"For if <S%H518><s%> you will not let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> swarms <S%H6157><s%> of insects on you and on your servants <S%H5650><s%> and on your people <S%H5971><s%> and into your houses; <S%H1004><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of swarms <S%H6157><s%> of insects, and also <S%H1571><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> they [dwell.]

"But on that day <S%H3117><s%> I will set <S%H6395><s%> apart <S%H6395><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> where <S%H834><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> are living, <S%H5975><s%> so that no <S%H1115><s%> swarms <S%H6157><s%> of insects will be there, <S%H8033><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> am in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

"And I will put <S%H7760><s%> a division <S%H6304><s%> between <S%H996><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> and your people. <S%H5971><s%> Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> sign <S%H226><s%> shall occur. <S%H1961><s%>"' "

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%> And there came <S%H935><s%> great <S%H3515><s%> swarms <S%H6157><s%> of insects into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> was laid <S%H7843><s%> waste <S%H7843><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the swarms <S%H6157><s%> of insects in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to your God <S%H430><s%> within the land. <S%H776><s%>"

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is not right <S%H3559><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> for we shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> what is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%> If <S%H2005><s%> we sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> what is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> before their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> will they not then stone <S%H5619><s%> us?

"We must go <S%H1980><s%> a three <S%H7969><s%> days' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> as He commands <S%H559><s%> us."

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I will let <S%H7971><s%> you go, <S%H7971><s%> that you may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> you shall not go <S%H1980><s%> very far <S%H7368><s%> away. Make <S%H6279><s%> supplication <S%H6279><s%> for me."

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going <S%H3318><s%> out from you, and I shall make <S%H6279><s%> supplication <S%H6279><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that the swarms <S%H6157><s%> of insects may depart <S%H5493><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> from his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and from his people <S%H5971><s%> tomorrow; <S%H4279><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> do not let Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> deal <S%H8524><s%> deceitfully <S%H8524><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> in not letting <S%H7971><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and made <S%H6279><s%> supplication <S%H6279><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> asked, <S%H1697><s%> and removed <S%H5493><s%> the swarms <S%H6157><s%> of insects from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> from his servants <S%H5650><s%> and from his people; <S%H5971><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> remained. <S%H7604><s%>

But Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and he did not let <S%H7971><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>
